title: Pixel 4 128GB - after racing and updating and zero applications and files on phone only shows 111Gb?
content: Google pixel 4 128 GB phone only showing total capacity is 111 even when I download apps to tell diagnostics plug it into my computer dude diagnostics it's only showing that 111 ish are available why is this I've tried doing reset etc the operating system cannot take up that much space what's going on how do I fix this
